member_organisations: Aromates est membre de Syntec Relations Publics : http://www.syntec-rp.com/

goals__remit: Based in Paris, Aromates has been operating in the field of public relations for almost 30 years. During that period, it has become a leading organizer of events, networking activities and communication platforms, particularly in the areas of digital industries, energy and health.
